::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Perndabot::

Zardus emerges from the forest, activating his jetpack. "Panzertron," he says 
into his comm-link, "I am heading for your ship. I trush the defences won't 
slagg me?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica and Bloodystrike walk up to BrightBlade and the two bots near her.

"What are you three doing here?" Reptilica asks, he and Bloodystrike aiming 
their guns at the three.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot lands behind BrightBlade, his gun ready.
